posts.title: My 1st post
posts.body: Made a video1 for a Long time no see

posts.title: Finally Leart React Basics
posts.body:
Context and UseContext API - Bring all paramaters in components and its methods in a function under context folder and name it has DataContext.js..
And add <DataProvider> component and import the Datacontext class in App.js then remove all paramters in all components and keep it in datacontext.js file.
Axios API - Default methods For GET,POST,PUT,PATCH and DELETE methods in API. Its uses JSON to store and retrive data.
npm JSON server - Similar to Axios API but need to set the header, body and content for it.
UseParam - To get the Id from URL in component
UseState and UseEffect , UseRef 
Router V6
Controlled Inputs, props,prop drilling and Components, JSX
